page.title: 05A Visit To Penair
page.content: In September I will be going to Penair School.This term I went to find out what it is like. On Wed. 17th of July I visited Penair School.The head of the 1st year took me from the main gate into the main hall.I was with the other children going there next term and we all sat in rows in the hall with the the other visitors.I thought it was really strange and probably the rest of us felt it too.There were 5 form tutors sitting in a row and I wondered if one would teach me.At dinner I bought a pasty and a chocolate ball and a glass of coke.All the food seemed very cheap and I had not expected this. We walked into our class rooms and filled out forms with questions like "when were you born?" etc.Later we had our first lesson,English.I think I will enjoy it here,next term.
